name: vscode-auto-scroll-and-switch
description: Automatically scroll through files and switch between tabs for monitoring and presentations

autoScroll.scrollDelay.description: Delay between scroll steps in milliseconds (100-10000ms)

autoScroll.idleTimeout.description: Seconds to wait before auto-resuming after user interaction (5-300s)

autoScroll.autoResume.description: Automatically resume scrolling after idle timeout

autoScroll.scrollDirection.description: Direction of scrolling: bidirectional (up and down), downOnly, or upOnly

autoScroll.autoSwitchTabs.description: Automatically switch to next tab after completing a scroll cycle

autoScroll.maxScrollLines.description: Maximum number of lines to scroll before switching tabs (0 = scroll entire file)

autoScroll.scrollStep.description: Number of lines to scroll per step (1-50 lines)

autoScroll.enableComments.description: Enable automatic comment insertion during scrolling

autoScroll.commentFrequency.description: Insert a comment after scrolling this many lines

autoScroll.commentDuration.description: How long to keep the comment visible (in seconds) before deleting

autoScroll.commentText.description: Text to insert as comment (e.g., '// Checkpoint', '# Reading here', '<!-- Marker -->')
